TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed CustomQueryInterfaceMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject%28System.Object%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode%29> method's [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) calls can use the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode Allow = int32(1)

Docs.summary: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method calls can use the interface. When you use this value, the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject%28System.Object%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode%29> method overload functions like the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject%28System.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> overload.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode Ignore = int32(0)

Docs.summary: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method calls should ignore the interface.
